name: addSystemVariableToRoom
shortDescription: Assigns a system variable to a room
description: This method assigns a system variable to a room. If a room already is assigned to the system variable this assignment is overwritten.

parameters.name: systemVariableName
parameters.description: The name of the system variable to add to the room.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: The ID of the room as returned by createRoom() or getRooms().
